name: bw_matchbox
description: bw_matchbox is a web app for matching two Brightway
author: Chris Mutel <cmutel@gmail.com>

scripts.install-locally: echo --Install python library locally /venv, dev/-- && pip install -e .
scripts.install-setup: echo --Create local cnfiguration /venv, dev/-- && python bw_matchbox/bin/matchbox.py setup
scripts.install-example-project: echo --Download and install example project data /venv, dev/-- && python bw_matchbox/bin/matchbox.py example_project
scripts.install-all: echo --Install library for a local development (/venv, dev/)-- && npm-run-all install-locally install-setup install-example-project
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier stylelint lint && echo --All check-ups are passed--
scripts.start: echo --Run dev flask server /venv, dev/-- && python bw_matchbox/bin/matchbox.py webapp config.toml
